title: Dprint Configuration File
description: Schema for a dprint configuration file.

projectType.description: The type of project dprint is formatting.

oneOf.description: dprint is formatting an open source project whose primary maintainer is not a for-profit company or individual.
dprint is formatting a project run by a student or being used for educational purposes.
dprint is formatting a project whose primary maintainer is a non-profit organization.

dprint is formatting a project whose primary maintainer is a for-profit company or individual and the primary maintainer sponsored the project. Thank you for being part of moving this project forward!
dprint is formatting a project whose primary maintainer is a for-profit company or individual and you don't want to support dprint's development financially.

incremental.description: Whether to format files only when they change. Setting this to `true` will dramatically speed up formatting.

anyOf.description: A file path or url to a configuration file to extend.
A collection of file paths and/or urls to configuration files to extend.

lineWidth.description: The width of a line the printer will try to stay under. Note that the printer may exceed this width in certain cases.

indentWidth.description: The number of characters for an indent.

useTabs.description: Whether to use tabs (true) or spaces (false) for indentation.

newLineKind.description: The kind of newline to use.

oneOf.description: For each file, uses the newline kind found at the end of the last line.
Uses the system standard (ex. crlf on Windows).

includes.description: Array of patterns (globs) to use to find files to format.

excludes.description: Array of patterns (globs) to exclude files or directories to format.

plugins.description: Array of plugin URLs to format files.
